languages.text: "Вольный Торговец сблизил{mf|ся|ась} с ксеносом настолько, что попал{mf||а} в самую ее душу, постиг{mf||ла} чувства... Непростительная богомерзкая ересь!"
"The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец сблизил{mf|ся|ась} с ксеносом настолько, что попал{mf||а} в самую ее душу, постиг{mf||ла} чувства... Непростительная богомерзкая ересь!"

languages.text: “行商浪人和那个异形太过亲密，{mf|他|她}甚至触及到了她的灵魂，理解了她的感受……多么邪恶！多么罪不可恕的异端行为！”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人和那个异形太过亲密，{mf|他|她}甚至触及到了她的灵魂，理解了她的感受……多么邪恶！多么罪不可恕的异端行为！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est {mf|devenu|devenue} tellement proche de la xénos qu'{mf|il|elle} a pu voir jusque dans les tréfonds de son âme... Quelle ignominie ! Quelle infâme hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} est {mf|devenu|devenue} tellement proche de la xénos qu'{mf|il|elle} a pu voir jusque dans les tréfonds de son âme... Quelle ignominie ! Quelle infâme hérésie ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha intimado tanto con la xenos que se ha adentrado en su misma alma para comprender sus sentimientos... ¡Eso es una herejía profana e imperdonable!».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha intimado tanto con la xenos que se ha adentrado en su misma alma para comprender sus sentimientos... ¡Eso es una herejía profana e imperdonable!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者は異種族と親密になり、{|彼|彼女}は彼女の魂に入り込み、感情を理解した…許されざる異端よ！」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者は異種族と親密になり、{|彼|彼女}は彼女の魂に入り込み、感情を理解した…許されざる異端よ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} ist der Xenos so nah gekommen, dass {mf|er|sie} tief in ihre Seele eingedrungen ist, ihre Gefühle verstanden hat ... Gottlose, unverzeihliche Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader has grown so close to the xenos that {mf|he|she} has delved into her very soul, comprehended her feelings... Ungodly, unforgivable heresy!"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, zenoyla o denli yakınlaştı ki artık ruhuna girdi, hislerini idrak etti... Düpedüz sapkınlık, kâfirlik!"
